Name: WMS-Map
Other: allow the creation of dynamic maps including simple zoom functionality and clickable googlemap-like overlays.

Name: OpenLayers
Other: support for navigation, icons, markers, and layer selection.

Name: Leaflet
Other: support for navigation, icons, markers, layers, GeoJSON

Name: MapDotNet
Other: digitizing, wkt rendering, draggable icons and content, geospatial queries (intersection, overlapping)

Name: CivicMaps Tile Engine
Other: drag and zoom. Intended for integration with Drupal.

Name: SpatialFX
Other: Web client/server developer API, drag pan/zoom, drawing support, full DHS and MIL-STD-2525 symbology support.

Name: SpatialRules
Other: Java-based rules engine for detecting spatial and temporal conditions. Designed for a detect-response paradigm to monitor large populations of dynamic objects with spatial and temporal attributes.
